Package letters

This package contains all the different kinds of letters

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Content
    Interface for the content of the letters.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DecoratingLetter<L extends Letter<?>>
    Decorator to add specific features to a letter such as Registered letter and Urgent letter
    Letter<C extends Content>
    Abstract class which defines an unspecific letter
    Money
    Class which defines the Money that can be added to a PromissaryNote
    PromissaryNote
    Class which defines a PromissaryNote which is a letter with a money content
    ReceiptAcknowledgmentLetter
    Class which define a ReceiptAcknoledgmentLetter which is sent when someone receives a registered letter
    RegisteredLetter<C extends Letter<?>>
    Class with defines a RegisteredLetter which once it's received trigger the sending of a receipt of acknowledgment
    SimpleLetter
    Class which defines a SimpleLetter which is a letter with a text content
    Text
    Class which defines the text content that can be added to a SimpleLetter
    ThanksLetter
    Class which defines a ThanksLetter which is sent when an inhabitant receives a PromissaryNote
    UrgentLetter<C extends Letter<?>>
    Class which define an UrgentLetter that cost twice as much as the letter sent

Package letters Description

This package contains all the different kinds of letters
